0.6.4 (2015-08-25)
------------------
* boost revision
* explicit dependency to boost
* more cleanup
* remove obsolete autogenerated mainpage.dox files
* remove trailing whitespaces
* migrate to package format 2
* sort dependencies
* critically review dependencies
* Contributors: ipa-fxm
